alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued January 04 at 3:04AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THE COMAL COUNTY SHERIFF`S OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR CARLIEGH O`DELL, WHITE, FEMALE, 13 YEARS OLD, 5 FEET 4 INCHES TALL, 139 POUNDS, BLONDE HAIR, GREEN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING GRAY SWEATSHIRT WITH "LONESTAR RANCH" LETTERING ON FRONT, MULTI-COLORED SHORTS, AND BLACK VAN ATHLETIC SHOES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR AN UNKNOWN 21 YEAR OLD MALE SUBJECT IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A BLUE TRUCK, UNKNOWN MAKE, UNKNOWN MODEL BEARING UNKNOWN LICENSE PLATE NUMBER. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE COMAL COUNTY SHERIFF`S OFFICE AT 8 3 0 6 2 0 3 4 0 0.
